betterquesting:10.desc:8: The Shovel of Purification is an item added by the Lost Magic module, which not only allows you to quickly dig through decayed rock and dirt, but also right-click to clean up the decayed goo that results from the dissolution of decayed logs, avoiding the creation of a large number of Mystic Slimes, making it an excellent prop for cleaning up decay. \n\nBut although it has such excellent performance, it still can't stop the fact that it can only destroy one square at a time, so that means it can only be used to deal with a small area of decay, and it can also be used to dig passageways to underground caves that have been corrupted. \To create this item, you need to unlock the "Spade of Purification", which is located in "Arcane Magic".
betterquesting:10.name:8: Cleansing of Corrupted Cubes - Spade of Purification
